## PropertyInfo type

Information about a single property of an object-like type including its optionality.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type PropertyInfo<T extends Type<unknown> = Type<unknown>> = {
    partial: boolean;
    type: T;
};
```

**References:** [Type](./types.type.md)
